name: Antonio jackson
coverLetter: I'm relocating to Eugene or wherever I can get setup with my 13 yr old son I've been growing for personal use for over 20 yrs slowed down after my 1st son but always a frequent user.Started when I was 10 and simply adore plants and especially the Marijuana I call medicine.I can fly out at anytime give a reasonable time frame very people friendly and trustworthy..trying to provide my son with a better life..I have applied for and taken the permit to handle test and I have the confirmation email I'm simply waiting for the payment email so I can make the payment
